room_title: Escape room "Portlandia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: We played the portlandia game.  I’ve been wanting to play this game for a long time and it’s always booked up so I was beyond thrilled when I was able to make a reservation for 6.  The props are amazing and it seems like a good game.  Our experience however was ruined by another player that was in the room, he was not part of our group of 6.  He bulldozed all of us, if we found a clue he grabbed it out of our hands, if we were standing there trying to figure something out he told us in no uncertain terms that “that puzzle has already been solved it’s time for you to move on”.   My group and I spent the last 40 minutes of the game just leaning on furniture  and rolling our eyes at each other because it was apparently a one man show.  This doesn’t reflect negatively on the business, like I said I’m sure it’s a good game, I just wouldn’t know.  Basically my group forked our 180.00 to watch some guy play the game (with no help from his friends either).  I guess in order to avoid this I’ll just have to book the entire room, which probably won’t happen because I’m not spending 300.00 just to make sure I don’t get railroaded.

room_title: Escape room "Portlandia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: We did the Portlandia for my sons 18th birthday and had the best time ever! Will definitely be booking again soon.

room_title: Escape room "Portlandia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: Such a perfect way for our team outing. The Portlandia room was perfection. Thank you for such a fantastic day!

room_title: Escape room "Portlandia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: This was my second escape room type experience, and we had a BLAST solving the Portlandia room! It was a really great all-around experience, the owner was awesome, and the whole setup was well done.

room_title: Escape room "Portlandia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: The Portland room was well designed and an absolute blast for a party of 9! We especially appreciated the fun surprise.

room_title: Escape room "Portlandia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: I have done two rooms and both were amazing! Portlandia is a great room for friends out having a good time, and Sherlock is perfect for someone who really wants to solve some puzzles and use their critical thinking chops! Highly recommend this to everyone.
